snippet.title: Winter - Indie Game
snippet.description:
#indie #indiegame #development #games #game #gameplay #thirdperson 

Winter — is my own indie adventure game in medieval setting with intense gameplay and exciting combat system. Along the way, you will meet creatures that will challenge you to fight and try to get your power. Follow your destiny, let the story tell you about how the first snow fell.

Winter is coming...

Add to wishlist.

Available on Steam 1.12.2022.
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2216010/Winter/
Insta:  https://www.instagram.com/artem_lavr_nyuk/

Music used: Fuzzeke - This is my Destiny
